channel.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://skarred-lands.com/Themes/InsidiousV2-u/images/theme/logo.png[/img] [size=14pt][url=http://skarred-lands.com/index.php?action=register]Register[/url] [url=http://skarred-lands.com/index.php?action=play]Play[/url] [url=http://skarred-lands.com/index.php?action=download]Download[/url][/size][/center]
[size=20pt]Why Skarred?[/size] Skarred Lands is a RuneScape Private Server (RSPS) server from the 317 revision. It does have content from higher and more recent revisions, but it's not the newest. It still has an old-school feel to it, while not really being old school. What sets our server apart from others is how our server is ran. We put the community first, because if they're not satisfied, we're not. Don't be mistaken, though, because our updates are anything besides normal. One week we may just be updating some bugs, and the next week we could be releasing a new minigame or similar. We like to keep our players guessing, and our staff guessing a little more. I hope to see you in game soon, Mod Watson
[size=20pt]An Important Message[/size] Our server is in a [u]public beta[/u] right now. Which means two things (mostly). One is that [u]all players must register on the forums to play[/u]. I know most people hate this requirement, and it is planned to be removed, but it is needed for the beta because it is important that players report any and all bugs to the staff, and having you on the forums already just puts you one step closer to doing that. Two, it means that our server isn't perfect. I will not guarantee your current experience as we are attempting to patch whatever bugs are left on top of adding new content and more updates.
[size=20pt]Features[/size] [code=List]Custom dungeoneering Working dwarf cannon. Custom Yell titles & yell chat channel Dicing - Both public dicing and clan dicing Achievements - Always adding more Working beer barrels - chug a lug. Mystery boxes. Custom smiley system. Better teleporting interface (all teleports use the same interface for less confusion) [INFO] and Lottery ticker with toggle messages. Working pickables. Custom minigame - Weapon Roulette. More to come. Unique home Better/Proper run orb handling Unique skill lock tab Curses & prayers (duh) Spellbook switching (more duh) Skill display toggle (similar to runescape) Player ranks above heads Instant player rank updating (no more relogging for playerrights!) And so many more... Come play and find out![/code]
[size=20pt]Media[/size] [spoiler=Media] Home [img]http://puu.sh/dccBv[/img] Customize-able title + chat channel [img]http://puu.sh/dccGv[/img] Custom smilies: [img]http://puu.sh/cC9G8[/img] Teleporting interface [img]http://puu.sh/cC9qa[/img][img]http://puu.sh/cC9hL[/img] Dungeoneering start: [img]http://puu.sh/cCmu6[/img] Dungeoneering in-game: [img]http://puu.sh/dccSh[/img] Weapon Roulette lobby: [img]http://puu.sh/cYgZD[/img] Weapon Roulette game: [img]http://puu.sh/cYh3I[/img] More of the game: [img]http://puu.sh/cYiZy[/img] Check the run orb.. Standing: [img]http://puu.sh/dcemC.jpg[/img] Sitting: [img]http://puu.sh/dcek7.jpg[/img] XP Locks: [img]http://puu.sh/dcehC.jpg[/img] The skilltab (just in case someone wanted to see) [img]http://puu.sh/dccJ4.png[/img] Curses: [img]http://puu.sh/dccKu.jpg[/img] My little owner office: [img]http://puu.sh/cC79v.jpg[/img] Instant player rights updating: [img]http://puu.sh/d5mTC[/img] (Clan owner: mod watson. Mod test is a friend of mod watson) [img]http://puu.sh/deaBN/0788fa4809.jpg[/img] (Clan owner: mod test. Mod watson is a friend of mod test but is also an in-game admin) [img]http://puu.sh/deaQY/d9d4cf1b5e.jpg[/img] Bury all option: [iurl=#burycredits]Credits[/iurl] [img]http://puu.sh/deVru.png[/img] After burying 28 bones: (XP may need a tweak) [img]http://puu.sh/dglIZ.png[/img] Auto joining clans [img]http://puu.sh/dglGN.png[/img] The current look of the skilling store: [img]http://i.imgur.com/yENkbK4.jpg[/img] Making a fury :D :D [img]http://i.imgur.com/PxQ7nnV.gif[/img] Tanning some hides: [img]http://i.imgur.com/u8cLMOe.gif[/img] Making rune bolts (unf) into dragon bolts (dat misclick) [img]http://i.imgur.com/DsSHtk3.gif[/img] Mining some sandstone and granite: [img]http://i.imgur.com/k52KnwO.gif[/img] Opening a gate and it resetting [img]http://i.imgur.com/mciwaJU.gif[/img] Bitches ain't nothing but boards and nails [img]http://i.imgur.com/9DHFU83.gif[/img] Some of the dungeon npcs (Didn't want to get in combat :o ) [img]http://i.imgur.com/M8wBm6O.jpg[/img] Catching implings and looting (jar req. coming soon :( ) [img]http://i.imgur.com/qDf0RJW.gif[/img] Eatza pizza! and cake.. and pie. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ziy4olW.gif[/img] Fishing rocktails in the Mysterious caves [img]http://i.imgur.com/mJeXNRd.gif[/img] Godwars (back in it's prime :) ) [img]http://puu.sh/dvjAd/f155d2fbfd.png[/img] Players Online (X, Y data only shows for staff). [img]http://puu.sh/dvkrX/a2cc4b0b26.png[/img] Godwars [b][u]BEFORE[/u][/b] the clipping fix: [img]http://puu.sh/dvjxl/61bfbde0e9.png[/img] Godwars [b][u]AFTER[/u][/b] the clipping fix: (Notice the npcs are no longer in the wall attempting to hit me) [img]http://puu.sh/dvjS8/e0ecca9f47.png[/img] Armadyl grappling: [img]http://i.imgur.com/h7EuolI.gif[/img] Running to/from sara's encampment. The middle was missing (There are npcs, this gif was pre-npc) [img]http://i.imgur.com/W610hm4.gif[/img] Swimming between zammy: [img]http://i.imgur.com/jafAjN1.gif[/img][/spoiler]
[size=20pt]Updates[/size](Newest first) [size=17pt]Server[/size] [code]Added mithril grapple making Rewrote achievement handler for easier (more efficient) achievements Added support for godwars objects Grappling to/from arma encampment Swimming to/from zammy encampment The full (Was missing 1 part) path to the saradomin encampment Prayer/Teleport on god altars in each chamber. ----- Cleaned up ::players command and added crowns for client update. Re-Enabled the GWD teleport. Fixed godwars chamber clipping Fixed possibility of fishing a dead spot. Fixed mining objects ghost spawning in mysterious caves. Fixed jewelry interface coming up when any item used on furnace. Disabled double XP ----- Lowered Abyssal Whip bonuses Increased Chaotics bonuses Removed prayer bonus from bolts Wrote new gate and double door editor. Added gates between lumbridge and varrock. Fixed initiate armour not going to the correct equip slot Fixed slayer task nullpointer Fixed clan chat nullpointer Added support for packet 218 (Report player) Added support for mod-muting using the report player interface Added support for "offline" muting and banning. Added support for fight caves wave interface. Lowered tokens on floor 3 of dungeoneering. Removed "Apply now" from staff interface. Fixed double death by npc server point gain. Enabled Double XP for the weekend ----- Replaced NPCs in Mysterious caves. Added rocktail and cavefish support for fishing & cooking Added new fishing spawns in Mysterious caves. Added support for fishing spots to "Die". They don't move though. Spawn timers are random. Added new shop at home "Grummy's Goods" Removed all but home teleport tab from general store, and added the tab to make teleports in place. Made weapons in Weapon Roulette a lot more random than before. You'll never guess what weapon comes next.. Fixed leather crafting not crafting the item displayed. Fixed firemaking, now has ashes, walking back, global objects, etc.. Fixed leather crafting not removing all leathers. Updated some boss npc's stats (I might have forgot which ones...) ----- Fixed slayer tasks not updating per kill Fixed issue causing slayer task to not reset properly. Fixed any possible issue with warriors guild stairs taking up/down. Fixed trade being able to be done in wildy (sometimes) Rewrote Teleport Tab code Added teleport tab making (a little different than runescape) Boosted crafting exp. Added skilling tasks (More tasks to come) ---- Added impling jar looting - Used impling data from runescape Made implings actually get captured when you catch them (aka removed from world) Added support for eating Cakes, Pies, and Pizzas. Eating a full pie will leave a pie dish. Made pest control doors work like doors. Updated floor 1 dungeoneering npcs. Modified exp for Hunter (lower) Added Kingly Impling and Zombie impling Fixed server cycle time Fixed hexhunter rarity ----- Fixed Pure Ess mining in some locations. Edited Crystal Chest messages to be more dynamic towards the players inventory (As if it matters) Rewrote RFD minigame, fixing it being inaccessible. Also rewrote the RFD minigame shop handler. Tweaked the teleport from my zone. Similar to RFD, rewrote 90% or so of the code to Fight Caves. Fixed Fight Caves (jad minigame) not starting. Fixed Tz-Kih prayer draining ability Added entrance message to Fight Caves Fixed npcs not spawning out of view, or not doing anything when barley in view Removed EventManager instances in NPCHandler. ---- Crafting - Totally redone.. Tanning, Gem cutting, Jewelry making all work (rings, amulets, gems, even furys) Fletching - Support for making bolts and adding tips. No method for enchanting atm. Woodcutting - Fixed magic tree, added some missing trees, Fixed multi-cut. Mining - Added granite & sandstone, added some missing ids. Lumbridge - Added support for the broken fence in the cemetery Al Kharid - Made shanty pass work Wrote my own server sided vote checker as GTL's stopped working. Fixed kicking players using the server console, it now does a more forceful kick. Fixed ::Tele command for owners (me, lol) Added new object handling to make objects spawn with their original rotation. Created a new gate handling system. I still have some kinks to work out and about 1000 gates to add. bare with me. Updated Dragon impling prices. Added closing to gate handler. Fixed admin/owner bank command. Finished Lumbridge-Drayor gates. Runecrafting - Fixed issue where it would give multiple runes off by 1. Added moulds to the skill shop (no where else to put em). ---- Fixed empty glasses popping up in inventory. Fixed gold and silver smelting options. Fixed Weapon Roulette smuggle Fixed possible npc error when new npcs spawn Fixed slayer reqs for banshees Fixed bug causing rune altars not giving multiple runes. Fixed bronze bar requirements Tweaked Woodcutting exp Added rejoining clans on login. Added support for new "bury all" option on bones Added support for the new "smelt all" in replace of smelt X. Updated slayer shop prices. Lowered amount of rune essense in Skilling shop Changed magic shop. Aubury is now in charge of it. Added support for aubury's three chat options (talk, teleport, trade). Talking opens a prompt asking if you want to do option 2 or 3. Teleport takes you to the essense mines (teleport to be configured..), and trade opens the shop. Fixed runecrafting altars and Mausoleum. Sizes were off by 1. Fixed slayer - wasn't assigning tasks. Finished Weapon Roulette dialogues. Added support for new clan chat icons. Added support for pure essense mining at the essense mines. Converted clan saving from .ini to .json. Added support for the portals in the essense mines (They all take you back to Aubury). Fixed a bug causing extra messages to print out (to console) Fixed item on object packet error (thanks to xX4m4zingXx for pointing out the issue :) ) Fixed Weapon Roulette lobby not registering a player teleported. Fixed issue causing server points not to save (sometimes) Removed PK points & Slayer points and replaced with server points[/code] [size=17pt]Client[/size] [code]Changed achievement text to buttons Fixed tab to reply Fixed bank not scrolling with mousewheel ----- Added crown support for players online. Fixed godwars. ----- Fixed Moderator mute option on report interface Renamed some rules on report interface Fixed possible packet error when reporting. Fixed rule #13 not being able to be clicked. Added Fight Caves wave interface. Enabled the idle timer packet, changed it's time from 1 minute to approx. 10. ----- Fixed client zoom bug Fixed zooming in when interfaces open ---- Fixed a bug where if the client couldn't load (Also being investigated) you couldn't close the client. Added new "bury all" option for all bones. Replaced "Smelt X" with "Smelt All" Added clan chat icons (YAY) Added support for crowns on interfaces (This was a fudgeing runt and a half). Updated clan chat interface to use crowns I removed the little into screen, now you can login as soon as the client is loaded. I also fixed a bug causing the run orb not to work properly. Other minor updates were done but aren't important.[/code]

item.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!

@Skarred_Lands wrote:

It came to my attention yesterday that when I released the godwars, it wasn’t in the working condition I thought it was in. I’m very sorry about that, and I spent the greater portion of today rectifying that issue

Added mithril grapple making Rewrote achievement handler for easier (more efficient) achievements Added support for godwars objects Grappling to/from arma encampment Swimming to/from zammy encampment The full (Was missing 1 part) path to the saradomin encampment Prayer/Teleport on god altars in each chamber.

Changed achievement text to buttons Fixed tab to reply Fixed bank not scrolling with mousewheel

And now, for the media (this update deserves it!):
Armadyl grappling:

Running to/from sara’s encampment. The middle was missing (There are npcs, this gif was pre-npc)

Swimming between zammy:

item.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!
item.dc:creator: @Skarred_Lands Skarred Lands
item.description:
@Skarred_Lands wrote:

briney21:

definitely a server worth playing and getting into if your sick of servers that dont update give this a try daily updates great players helpful staff members

really, give us a chance before you decide we are “just another server” like others.

Double XP is over, I saw some people getting some good 99’s, hope everyone enjoyed it while it did last.
Todays updates:

Server:

Cleaned up ::players command and added crowns for client update. Re-Enabled the GWD teleport. Fixed godwars chamber clipping Fixed possibility of fishing a dead spot. Fixed mining objects ghost spawning in mysterious caves. Fixed jewelry interface coming up when any item used on furnace. Disabled double XP

Client:

Added crown support for players online. Fixed godwars.

Got some media this week, because wine not?

Godwars (back in it’s prime )

Players Online (X, Y data only shows for staff).

Godwars BEFORE the clipping fix:

Godwars AFTER the clipping fix:
(Notice the npcs are no longer in the wall attempting to hit me)

Read full topic

item.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!
item.dc:creator: @Skarred_Lands Skarred Lands
item.description:
@Skarred_Lands wrote:

Some nice updates. Again I forgot to take some media, I might edit some in later…

DOUBLE EXP WEEKEND!!
That’s right guys. This weekend is our first double EXP weekend. If you haven’t started playing yet, now would be the time to.

Server:

Lowered Abyssal Whip bonuses Increased Chaotics bonuses Removed prayer bonus from bolts Wrote new gate and double door editor. Added gates between lumbridge and varrock. Fixed initiate armour not going to the correct equip slot Fixed slayer task nullpointer Fixed clan chat nullpointer Added support for packet 218 (Report player) Added support for mod-muting using the report player interface Added support for "offline" muting and banning. Added support for fight caves wave interface. Lowered tokens on floor 3 of dungeoneering. Removed "Apply now" from staff interface. Fixed double death by npc server point gain. Enabled Double XP for the weekend

Client:

Fixed Moderator mute option on report interface Renamed some rules on report interface Fixed possible packet error when reporting. Fixed rule #13 not being able to be clicked. Added Fight Caves wave interface. Enabled the idle timer packet, changed it's time from 1 minute to approx. 10.

[quote=“briney21, post:33, topic:548175”]daily updates
owner that listens and does what you suggest
all skills working 120 dung!
not a massive playerbase atm but is growing
great updates to come example: bank view, drop view and highscores
great xp rate not going to get everything 99 in a day
sick of mining same old ores? try out the granite mine like runescape.
same old gem cutting for 99? no thanks collect dragon hides and runescape craft till 99

also if anyone would be willing to come on and help make a video that would be fantastic thanks.[/quote]

I may not have the biggest server, and I may not have the best, but it’s players like you that keep me motivated.

Read full topic

item.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!
item.dc:creator: @Skarred_Lands Skarred Lands
item.description:
@Skarred_Lands wrote:

MINDR34D3R:

This sever is amazing, always updating community is great very talkative, active plays. this is the best Runescape PS i have ever played on I LOVE IT!

And with today’s updates, it’s even better.
[hr]
I promised you guys I’d do something with the Mysterious Caves, well there you go.
You can now fish Rocktail and cavefish using their respectable shoals in the mysterious caves. I’ve also put the LRC creatures from runescape in the caves. Each creature drops living minerals, and have drops similar to RuneScape’s.

Server:

Replaced NPCs in Mysterious caves. Added rocktail and cavefish support for fishing & cooking Added new fishing spawns in Mysterious caves. Added support for fishing spots to "Die". They don't move though. Spawn timers are random. Added new shop at home "Grummy's Goods" Removed all but home teleport tab from general store, and added the tab to make teleports in place. Made weapons in Weapon Roulette a lot more random than before. You'll never guess what weapon comes next.. Fixed leather crafting not crafting the item displayed. Fixed firemaking, now has ashes, walking back, global objects, etc.. Fixed leather crafting not removing all leathers. Updated some boss npc's stats (I might have forgot which ones...)

I’ve only got 1 gif, but I hope you enjoy it all the same…

Read full topic

item.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!
item.dc:creator: @Skarred_Lands Skarred Lands
item.description:
@Skarred_Lands wrote:

xXSh0ckXx:

Amazing and very unique server providing a lot of content. Sk8r managed to develop the smallest things, where other servers lack of, that’s why it’s so damn nice. I’d recommend everyone to play this, because i was a private beta tester. Since then i couldn’t wait to play with other players and make use of the new game experience skarred lands offers. Good luck with this!

Thanks you, means a lot

Got some more updates, :3
Sorry but didn’t make any media this time around…

Server:

Fixed slayer tasks not updating per kill Fixed issue causing slayer task to not reset properly. Fixed any possible issue with warriors guild stairs taking up/down. Fixed trade being able to be done in wildy (sometimes) Rewrote Teleport Tab code Added teleport tab making (a little different than runescape) Boosted crafting exp. Added skilling tasks (More tasks to come)

Client: (Been a while eh?)

Fixed client zoom bug Fixed zooming in when interfaces open

item.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!
item.dc:creator: @Skarred_Lands Skarred Lands
item.description:
@Skarred_Lands wrote:

briney21:

great server ++ owner listens to your ideas heaps has been changed around not just a server you can log into 2 days later you have everything 99 and everything in the game so its actually fun to play. not going to log in see half the game is maxed out with the best gear and the servers been out for 2 hours like half the other servers around. theres a custom mini game weapon roulette once you played that once and you notice how much fun it is you will never want to leave! so much being added and changed around daily its great fun. hope to see some more players soon even the emojis are awsome! come join and have a blast!

Thank you <3 I’m glad you love the game. I’m doing what I can to make it better every day.

Today’s updates:

Added impling jar looting - Used impling data from runescape Made implings actually get captured when you catch them (aka removed from world) Added support for eating Cakes, Pies, and Pizzas. Eating a full pie will leave a pie dish. Made pest control doors work like doors. Updated floor 1 dungeoneering npcs. Modified exp for Hunter (lower) Added Kingly Impling and Zombie impling Fixed server cycle time Fixed hexhunter rarity

Some media:
Some of the dungeon npcs (Didn’t want to get in combat :o )

Catching implings and looting (jar req. coming soon )

Eatza pizza! and cake… and pie.

item.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!
item.dc:creator: @Skarred_Lands Skarred Lands
item.description:
@Skarred_Lands wrote:

Again a minor amount of updates, but this time around they’re bug fixes. Thanks again to everyone pointing out the issues, it seriously helps.

Fixed Pure Ess mining in some locations. Edited Crystal Chest messages to be more dynamic towards the players inventory (As if it matters) Rewrote RFD minigame, fixing it being inaccessible. Also rewrote the RFD minigame shop handler. Tweaked the teleport from my zone. Similar to RFD, rewrote 90% or so of the code to Fight Caves. Fixed Fight Caves (jad minigame) not starting. Fixed Tz-Kih prayer draining ability Added entrance message to Fight Caves Fixed npcs not spawning out of view, or not doing anything when barley in view Removed EventManager instances in NPCHandler.

No client updates again.

Hyperon:

Thanks, and sorry for using your advertisement as a discussion.

Haha that’s fine. It happens sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: [BETA] Skarred Lands - Come make your mark today!
item.dc:creator: @Skarred_Lands Skarred Lands
item.description:
@Skarred_Lands wrote:

[quote=“Hyperon, post:21, topic:548175”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=667079.msg4461824#msg4461824 date=1417909695]

What software do you use to record and make your gifs?

You can use any recording software + photoshop to make GIFs
[/quote]
I don’t have those nice things. Plus camstudio is nice because it has no watermark but the download is broken on the website for me. Any recommendation for recording software? I have GIMP for images and it does the job.[/quote]

I use gifcam, personally. It’s simple, hella easy to use. and has like 5 different export types.
It looks like this:

And You resize it by dragging the corners.

Read full topic
